title: THE DETROIT PISTONS WON THE DRAFT!
description:
Jalen and Jacoby celebrate a great night for Jalen's hometown Pistons, who suddenly have a GREAT young core. Plus! A breakdown of all the biggest moments of the draft, a look at the quickly devolving situation in Brooklyn, and a full red carpet review of the best outfits from Barclays. Ties are out, chains are in! All that and more, on Jalen & Jacoby. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Did The Pistons Win The 2022 NBA Draft?
